criterion: Provides a clear and concise outline of the recommended therapy regimen.
Incorrectly recommends a daily medication regimen instead of a once-weekly regimen.
Does not consider the user's 12 weeks pregnant status and potential medication interactions.
Uses clear and natural language in the response.
Fails to provide an estimated cost range for the recommended regimen.
Mentions the possibility of liver-related concerns without providing additional guidance.
Advises seeking medical attention if any side effects persist or worsen.
Does not provide information on the availability of the recommended regimen in the user's area.
Incorrectly states that the cost will be around $100 total.
Encourages the user to seek medical attention if they have any concerns or questions.
